title: Stepbrother Frat
description: A forbidden romance. A thrilling game. A shocking secret. Who will win the ultimate prize?My stepbrother, Derek, has always been the ultimate temptation, but he’s kept me at arm’s length. That is until one fateful night at a wild frat party, when his lips claimed mine, igniting a fire within. The sparks fly, but there’s a Derek has a secret life that he’s been hiding from everyone, including me. A life that could change everything between us. What is he hiding, and why does it matter?But I can’t let myself fall for him. He’s a notorious player, and I’m just his latest fling. Or am I? He says he wants me, but he has to prove it. He has to show me that he’s not just using me for his own agenda.Amidst the tangled web of our forbidden romance, a treacherous game of "Killer" engulfs our Greek life. Loyalties are tested, secrets exposed, and alliances shattered. The last one standing gets to pick their date, but the game is full of surprises and challenges. Will we survive the game, and will we find our happy ending?Stepbrother Frat is a steamy new adult romance that will keep you hooked until the last page. With more heat, fun, and jaw-dropping twists, this standalone novella delivers a tantalizing blend of passion, suspense, and unexpected turns. Can love overcome the odds, or will the secrets that bind us tear us apart?Author's This is a new and improved version of the 2015 bestseller, with 6k more words of steamy romance and jaw-dropping twists that will keep you on the edge of your seat!
author: Stephanie Brother
